name: Cloudjs
tagline: CloudJS - A Simple Javascript Library Which help your blog or personal site's visitor to save your file directly to their Cloud Storages (DropBox, OneDrive, Google Drive etc.)
body:
### Welcome to CloudJS.
A very small Javascript Client Library which completely designed and developed in Pure Javascript.


### Say Good Bye!!! to "Save As Computer" file sharing system.
CloudJS specially build to serve file sharing most efficiently and securely over www with the help of APIs providing by most popular Cloud Service Providers. e.g. DropBox, GoogleDrive, OneDrive/SkyDrive(Former) more coming soon.

### Best Fit
1. Blogger
2. Personal
3. Magazine
4. Document Seller
5. And Any number of services which related to file sharing over websites or application.
 
### Authors and Contributors
@webmechanicx
